segments.text: I notice the girl standing there, reaching up for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She looks so excited, like she’s about to get a treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is balancing on that wobbly stool, and it’s making me nervous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just drying dishes, completely unaware of what’s happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is overflowing, and she’s standing right in it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe she hasn’t turned around yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are being so sneaky, but they’re also being really careless.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is going to tip, and then what?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The floor is already wet, and it’s only going to get worse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they get what they want and get down safely.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is so chaotic, but everyone seems fine with it.
segments.speaker: PAR
